Histogram calculation methods¶

methods.colorspaceHistogram(img, space='RGB')¶

A method proposed by TODO which uses three LBP_{8, 1} passes, one over each channel of the given color space

Parameters

  • img (numpy.ndarray) – The image to be processed

  • space (str, optional) – The color space to be used. Options are ‘HSV’, ‘YCrCb’ and

  • 'Dual' (concatenation of 'HSV' and 'YCrCb') –

  • space will be used (color) –

Returns

The concatination of the three calculated histograms

Return type

list(int)

methods.grayscaleLBP(img)¶

The simples algorithm collecting a single LBP_{8, 1} pass on a grayscale image into a histogram

Parameters

img (numpy.ndarray) – The image to be processed

Returns

The calculated histogram

Return type

list(int)

methods.maattaHistogram(img)¶

A method proposed by Maatta et al. which uses eleven passes concatenated to a single histogram. The passes are: An LBP_{16, 2} and an LBP_{8, 2} over the entire image and nine LBP_{8, 2} passed over overlapping squares

Parameters

img (numpy.ndarray) – The image to be processed

Returns

The concatination of the eleven calculated histograms

Return type

list(int)
